WHOUS.name: West of House
WHOUS.desc: This is an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.

SHOUS.name: South of House
SHOUS.desc: This area of the faces out toward the lake south of the house.

EHOUS.name: East of House
EHOUS.desc: This is an open field with facing toward the road, and the back door to the house opened.

HOUSE.name: Inside the house
HOUSE.desc: All the lights are off and the slience is unsettling.

KITCH.name: Kitchen
KITCH.desc: You go in and hear this high pitched noise, the tea in the kettle is steaming.

SMELL:.name: Smelly
SMELL:.desc: You are now in a smelly room that is very similiar to a bathroom.

ATTIC.name: Attic of the house
ATTIC.desc: You are now in the attic with some old trinkets that are a bit daunting.

CHEST.name: Treasure Chest
CHEST.desc: This is th treasure left by one of the Goonies from the 1985 classic, it is yours now.
